hackathon-description-text: The full hacker guide can be found here that explains the schedule for the entire event:

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Research Professor at Institute for Software Integrated Systems
Associate Professor and Director, Managerial Studies Program at Vanderbilt University

hackathon-requirements: Please include a description of your project, technologies used, and teammates. Videos are optional, but highly encouraged!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: FitBit, Jaybird Headphones, and Eno Hammock
Final round interviews in DC area which includes tickets to luxury suite at Verizon Center for a Capital’s game, Wizard’s game, or concert.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Prize: Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $2,000 in cash (for whole team) and internship offer / final-round full-time interview.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Capital One's API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Final round interviews in Charlotte and $250 Amazon gift card
Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.
Initial State API Pro Subscriptions and swag
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Initial State's API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2414 Highland Ave, Nashville, TN 37212, USA
hackathon-description-header: The first collegiate hackathon to call the rockin' city of Nashville, Tennessee home.
